title: Baker skin line sale?!
body:
I'm wondering If the baker skin line (Baker Pantheon, Sashimi Akali in particular) will be on the early sales of next month since i want to get them but not the whole bundle (not intrested in Leona or Olaf).

P.S: Not sure if this is the right boards for this article. If it isn't please tell me the right one ^^
